title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1201.1 - Dangerous operation of vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1201.1 - Dangerous operation of vehicles

State Regulations

No vehicle shall be operated carelessly or negligently, or in disregard of the rights or safety of others or without due caution and
circumspection, or at a speed or in a manner so as to endanger or to be likely
to endanger persons or property, or while the operator thereof is under the
influence of intoxicating liquors or any narcotic or habit forming drug, nor
shall any such vehicle be loaded in such a manner or with such materials, or be
so constructed, operated or equipped as to endanger or be likely to endanger
persons or property, or to be likely to render the use of vehicular crossings
unsafe. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21

1201.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
